name: Monkey D. Luffy
description: The captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and the main protagonist of the series. He is the son of the Revolutionary Army's commander, Monkey D. Dragon, the grandson of the Marine hero, Monkey D. Garp, the foster son of a mountain bandit, Curly Dadan, and the adopted brother of the late Portgas D. Ace and the revolutionary Sabo. His life long goal is to become the Pirate King by finding the legendary treasure left behind by the Pirate King, Gol D. Roger. He believes that being Pirate King means having the most freedom in the world.
